keel.Algorithms.Rule_Learning.Rules6

Class Regla

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Rule_Learning.Rules6.Regla

  • public class Regla
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: Regla (Rule).

    Description: This class implements a rule object for this rule learning algorithm. This class stores the antecedents, consequents and the list of invalid attributes.

    Company: KEEL

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ismael Duque Garc√≠a
